TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content: A 20 MW high-energy solid-state laser with various detection systems, including but not limited to high-resolution X-ray, Infrared and Optical Telescopes

Think of us like Space Switzerland.
So you're a horde of space dwelling snobs?
My my, someone sure is being a sour Kraut ;P

A 20 MW high-energy solid-state laser with various detection systems, including but not limited to high-resolution X-ray, Infrared and Optical Telescopes

So how fast would it take to shoot these down:

And the 2 light second engagement range? All detection systems are limited to the speed of light.

So you're a horde of space dwelling snobs?

The Swiss can be irritable, child...

My my, someone sure is being a sour Kraut ;P
Call me a Kraut as much as you like but it's true:)
Chobit, every defence system has a fatal flaw. It's a universal law. We just need to find yours.

So how fast would it take to shoot these down: -snip-

And the 2 light second engagement range? All detection systems are limited to the speed of light.

How many missiles is that? 50? As much time as I want, given they'd day about a day to reach me. But to take them out immediately, 3 minutes, maybe 4. All I'd have to do is snipe key missiles and cause chain reactions

Call me a Kraut as much as you like but it's true:)

Du bist nicht allein, and I love the way you used the Reichsadler in your avatar~<3

Chobit, every defence system has a fatal flaw. It's a universal law. We just need to find yours.

Sure, but I do not rely on one single system, I have several working together

And I presume then that you know each ones fatal flaw and another defence system covers that flaw then?

But even the best systems can be overwhelmed.

Edited May 20, 2013 by LeonG17

Du bist nicht allein, and I love the way you used the Reichsadler in your avatar~<3
Thank you:) Did you learn German in school? I'm asking because i know that a friend of mine who lives in Canada does. Edited May 20, 2013 by Canopus
James Bond has offered his services, says he will find the fatal flaw and bring an end to this raging conflict.
Could you give us a list of your defences and their capabilities, why not give us a fair chance to beat you

Could you give us a list of your defences and their capabilities, why not give us a fair chance to beat you
War doesn't work like that. If you want information about your Enemy you need some military intelligence people or spys.
Who said it was war? I thought we were just discussing how to break Chobit's defences?

Hey, you have ALL violated the evil overlord list multiple times.

>I will not build an unstoppable superweapon that has one very small inaccessible weakness

> If I have an unstoppable superweapon, I will use it as early and often as possible.

Chobit I missed it if you replied, any points of interest you can recommend on Laythe? Going to attempt a couple missions there, perhaps a colony.
Who said we were building them? I thought this is a purely hypothetical exercise. I don't want to kill chobit, then how will we have more PfL or fun discussions?

Who said we were building them? I thought this is a purely hypothetical exercise. I don't want to kill chobit, then how will we have more PfL or fun discussions?

If you are not with us...

SUDDENLY!

I... I swear I didn't invite him...

Who said we were building them? I thought this is a purely hypothetical exercise. I don't want to kill chobit, then how will we have more PfL or fun discussions?

i we killed chobit then we would have no more to laugh and be terrified off.
Exactly, but I thought that's what chobit is going to do with you? She said she had a shovel with you name on it....

Well, I just nuked Dr.Doofinshirtz... (Curse you-) SHADDUP!

I think now is the time to sue for peace.

Sue? Peace? We're at war? You sue for peace?

Edited May 20, 2013 by LeonG17
As far as I can tell, anyway.
Yey! But there was a war? And how was it ended?

Yey! But there was a war? And how was it ended?

There was a war. It ended because people stopped fighting it...
And it started how?
